https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bWxKYrFtGFNQw2CrwL8mAp46syd.jpg A teenage boy and his mother are on the run. The father is violent and has a history of beating up his wife. They manage to get away from him and drive far away, until they arrive in a small town where they settle down. They rent a house from a nice man and soon they forget everything that has happened in the past, until the boy begins to have bad dreams of his father. Count to 100
